result.title: what about this problem it is always wrong
result.content:
this code has wrong please help me to find the wrong in this c++ this is the problem https://www.urionlinejudge.com.br/judge/en/problems/view/1048 and this is the c++ code

` #include using namespace std;

double Salary,NewSalary,TheEarnedMoney;
   int main ()

  {
cin >> Salary;

if (Salary >= 0.0 && Salary <= 400.00)

{ TheEarnedMoney = (Salary * 15) / 100;

NewSalary = Salary + TheEarnedMoney;

cout <<"Novo salario: "<<NewSalary<<"\n";

cout <<"Reajuste ganho: "<<TheEarnedMoney<<"\n";

cout <<"Em percentual: 15 %\n";
}

else if  (Salary >= 400.01 && Salary <= 800.00)

{ TheEarnedMoney = (Salary * 12) / 100;

NewSalary = Salary + TheEarnedMoney;

cout <<"Novo salario: "<<NewSalary<<"\n";

cout <<"Reajuste ganho: "<<TheEarnedMoney<<"\n";

cout <<"Em percentual: 12 %\n";
}

else if (Salary >= 800.01 && Salary <= 1200.00)

{ TheEarnedMoney = (Salary * 10) / 100;

NewSalary = Salary + TheEarnedMoney;

cout <<"Novo salario: "<<NewSalary<<"\n";

cout <<"Reajuste ganho: "<<TheEarnedMoney<<"\n";

cout <<"Em percentual: 10 %\n";
}

else if (Salary >= 1200.01 && Salary <= 2000.00)

{ TheEarnedMoney = (Salary * 7) / 100;

NewSalary = Salary + TheEarnedMoney;

cout <<"Novo salario: "<<NewSalary<<"\n";

cout <<"Reajuste ganho: "<<TheEarnedMoney<<"\n";

cout <<"Em percentual: 7 %\n";
}

else if (Salary >= 2.000)

{ TheEarnedMoney = (Salary * 4) / 100;

NewSalary = Salary + TheEarnedMoney;

cout <<"Novo salario: "<<NewSalary<<"\n";

cout <<"Reajuste ganho: "<<TheEarnedMoney<<"\n";

cout <<"Em percentual: 4 %"<<endl;
}
return 0;

}`
